!** Verifying the email template
!|Script   |common                                                                                                              |
|check     |checkIfStringExistsIn;|${subject}                                                                     |$subject|true|
|$tresult1=|checkIfStringExistsIn;|${subject}                                                                     |$subject     |

|$tresult3=|checkIfStringExistsIn;|Transporter has not accepted the indent $order_id which was created on $sladate|$body        |

!**> Validating test result
!|Script  |Common                                                          |
|$tresult=|checkIfStringAreEqualInArray;|$tresult1,$tresult2,$tresult3,true|
